casebody.data:
TOWN OF MONROE
v.
DISCOVER PROPERTY AND CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 18, 2017

Paul G. Roche, in support of the petition.

Jeffrey J. Vita and Bethany L. Barrese, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn.App. 644, 151 A.3d 848 (2016), is denied.
